name: Team Z Premium Heavy Duty Heat Gun Kit with Case – Upgrade LCD Display, Overload Protection & 10 Sec Delayed Turn Off Function - High Temp (140F – 1202F) Hot Air Gun for Vinyl Wrap, Shrink Tubing
short_description: PREMIUM QUALITY: The heavy-duty heat gun for candle making is made of premium heat-resistant plastic. Also, it features a certified cable and a plug from UL USA & Canada, making it durable enough to serve you for years. A 10 sec delayed turn-off function with a countdown display will ensure that your heat gun cools down faster even after hours of usage. It will help increase the lifespan of the heat gun. A perfect heat gun for electricians, car wrappers, or DIYers!

COMPLETE KIT: This shrink wrap heat gun kit includes everything you need for your home renovation projects or professional usage. It includes a fast-heating hot air gun, deflector nozzle, concentrator nozzle, reflector nozzle, carbon burning nozzle, and a putty knife to help you in your home décor or renovation projects. Also, it comes with a protective case to help you keep your heat gun kit tools organized and convenient to carry.

LCD BACKGROUND DISPLAY: Our resin heat gun comes with a blue LCD background display to help you adjust the temperature settings accurately. You can adjust the temperature and fan speed with two Positions I: Fixed Low Temp Set” II: Full Range Variable Set. On Position one, the temp and fan speed is fixed. On position two the temp is fully adjustable in 18° increments from 140F to 1202F. Unlike white/ black LCDs, our blue LCD background display is more visible, making it easy for you.

MULTIPURPOSE: Our premium heat gun for shrink tubing can serve many purposes. Whether you want to use it to thaw pipes, loosen screws, strip wallpaper, remove paint from furniture, or repair your phone, you can do it all with our heavy-duty heat gun. With all the heat gun kit accessories, you will be able to direct an even layer of hot air and make stripping work much easier for yourself.

PERFECT GIFT FOR DIYERS: The versatile heat gun kit can be a perfect gift for your loved fond of DIY projects. With this heavy-duty heat gun kit, they can get their DIY projects or house renovations done right without requiring professional help. What are you waiting for? Place your order with us now and surprise your DIYer friend with this thoughtful gift!

name: 1800W Industrial Heat Gun, Fast Heating 122℉-1202℉ Variable Temperature Control Overheat Protection 2 Speed Air Flow with 4 Nozzles for Crafts, Shrinking Tubing, Vinyl Wrap (SG-1004)
short_description: Variable Temp Control & Instant Heating‌: 1800w super power, warms up in 1.5s, adjustable 122°F-1202°F range, suitable for delicate crafts or heavy-duty repairs
Industrial Durability: FR-4 Fiberglass PCB & overheat protection for 600+ hours stable use, plus a 5.9 ft (1.8m) abrasion-resistant cord for workshop resilience

Turbo Fans & Safety Design: Retractable heat-resistant cover prevents accidental burns; 2-speed fans (Ⅰ: 0-250 L/min, Ⅱ: 250-500 L/min) Turbocharge Airflow for Quick Paint Stripping, Shrink Tubing, or Vinyl Wrapping
Wide Applications‌: Come with 4 nozzles, perfect for SMD rework, vinyl wrap shaping, resin curing, shrink tubing, and more—ideal for engineers, auto pros, and DIYers

What You Get: 1 x SG-1004 heat gun( with 5.9ft cord), 4 x nozzle, 1 x instruction manual. Please read the instruction manual before use and our team of professionals is ready to deliver ongoing technical help

► 4 Nozzles Attached--Spoon reflector nozzle for shrinking heat shrink tube; Cone nozzle for Welding, shrink sleeving ; Fish tail surface nozzle for drying, thawing ; BBQ lighter for light the coal and so on; with ventilation slots, heat dissipation design can cooling down the motor during working to extend the using life

► Easy to Use & Widely Practicality--The lightweight handle design is suitable for the use of different habits, and it can be used for stripping paint, lighting charcoal, soldering pipes, shrinking PVC, removing rusted bolts, softening caulk around the sink or even bending and molding plastics as well as drying and thawing Guarantee

name: A Nice Heat Gun, Compact but Powerful, Variable Temp Control 122℉~1202℉, Fast Heating Smaller Heat Gun for Crafting, Shrink Tubing,Shrink Wrap,Vinyl Wrap, Intergrated Holder for Hands Free & Hanging
short_description: ✅【1800W Strong Power & Fast Heating】 1800W heating motor allows our powerful heat gun heat up in 1.5 seconds, within a short time high temperature can reach Max out at 1202℉,which helps increase the efficiency of the project and saves us a lot of time.

✅【Compact structure & Fashional 】The Mini heat gun is 20% smaller than the the orther similar heat gun products in market,It stems from the design concept of being smaller yet powerful, surface process of metallic paint add the heat gun a more exquisite look,we will love it so naturally just as we fall in love with an artwork.

✅【Variable Temp Control & 2 Modes】The upgraded heating gun with 7 variable temperature settings and 2 fan settings, allowing users to adjust the temperature from as low as 122℉ to as high as 1202℉, for convenience to deal with their works rightly.

✅【Hands-Free &Cord Protector】 The cute heat gun has a creatively designed rubber holder, which integrates three functions: hands free stand, cord sheath, hanging .it makes heat gun more stable on the table ,so let you feel more comfortable when you crafts.

✅【Assured quality &Overload Protection 】The heavy duty heat gun builed with high-quality matierial and high-level craftsmanship, adopts a rocket-shaped heating core made of exclusive iron-chromium alloy, it can operate continuously for over 600 hours.For safty it has an overload protector inside, as a cooling system it can shut-off automaticly when overheating to avoid damage to its electronic circuitry, cooperate with flame retardant protective matierials, the cover and handle remain cool during extended use, it can prevent accidental ignition and hurt to user, meanwhile extends the product's service life.

✅【 4 Extra nozzles& Wide Applications】4 different nozzles interchangeable make the hot air gun easy to handle in every scenario, those are compatible with most other heat gun models and so easy to replace them, suitable for heat shrink tubing,shrink wrap,Crafts DIY,heating PVC, electronics, cell phone repairing, car wrap; removing paint or floor tiles, loosening rusty bolts and other heating or defrosting applications.

name: 110V Hot Air Gun Welding Torch 1600W Heat Gun Plastic Welder Roofing Welder Kits

[Advantages]: Well crafted, durable, powerful, reliable in performance, designed with heating sleeve protection and electronic heating protection function, suitable for long-term 24-hour operation.

[Warranty]: As the plastic welding machine specialist manufacturer, we promise that we provide best quality product to customer, in case you catch any problem during using this 1600W heat gun, please contact us directly, we will response to you quickly.

name: Heat Gun, SEEKONE 1800W Hot Air Gun Kit with Large Digital LCD Display Variable Temperature (122°F-1112°F) Memory Settings and 4 Nozzles for Paint Remover/Stripper, Home Improvement/Restoration
short_description: 【Heads Up】After you turn off the heat gun with the switch, the fan will run for another a few seconds to cool down, and the power will be cut off automatically after a few seconds. This is the function of the power-off delay feature, which helps to improve safety and prolong the service life of the heat gun

【Strong Power With 2 Modes】 SEEKONE Digital LCD Display 1800W Heat Gun provides strong power quickly heat up to 1100℉(600℃) in seconds. Two modes switch with variable temperature by digital control [ I: 120℉-750℉ (50℃-400℃); II: 120℉-1100℉ (50℃-600℃)] . It can adjust the temperature quickly with long press. Professional heater gives outstanding performance

【Large LCD Display & Power-On Memory】 SEEKONE DIY heat gun digital control with Large LCD Display, you can adjust the air volume and temperature precisely, the use temperature is clearly on the LCD display. Our heat gun built-in power-on memory function, it will continue working on last set TEMP & SPEED, no need to resetting again. This is the first one heat gun can change ℃ to ℉, please press the 2 wind speed button in same time for few seconds to set the conversion between Celsius and Fahrenhe

【Overheat Protection & Power-Off Delay Function】Using the dual heating wire for rapid heating, the Integrated overheat protection blocks the heating element when the temperature is too high and prevents burning. Delay off function makes the heating wire cool down after shutting down, it will prolong the device life and safety

【Easy to Use with Scientific Ergonomic Design】The lightweight heat gun and Scientific Ergonomic design handle can prevent repetitive strain injuries and other musculoskeletal disorders, suitable for stripping paint, bending pipes, lighting charcoal, shrinking PVC, removing rusted bolts, softening caulk around the sink or even bending and molding plastics as well as drying and thawing purpose

【Four Accessories】 Deflector nozzle directs a long, narrow heat pattern to the work surface; Two concentrator nozzles direct a concentrated heat flow to the work surface; Reflector nozzle disperses heat flow evenly around the whole work surface

name: YIHUA 959D-Digital Hot Air Rework Station, High Power with 3 Memories, Airflow Efficiency, °F /°C Display, Accurate Temp.(212°F~932°F), Brushed Aluminum Panel & Safety Features
short_description: Quick Heating & Well-Built – The hot air gun heats up rapidly when picked up from the holder thanks to the improved heating element and heating system design. Plus, the control panel is made with solid & brushed aluminum to prevent leaving burnt marks by accident.

3 Preset Channels – Save your regularly used settings into three preset channels and jump between channels with just one press. You no longer have to adjust the temperature over and over just for components and solders with different temperature parameters.

High Performance – Want a bit more 'oomph'? We got just what you're looking for. Our rework station is capable of putting out 120L of hot air at a maximum stabilized temperature of 932°F. With this station, you can conduct rework operations on a broad range of components.

Advanced Functions & Safety Features– An in-holder standby function to help cool the hot air gun when it is not in use, preserving your hot air gun in mint condition for longer. Equipped with YIHUA’s exclusive Hot Air Gun Fail-safe function to make your work safer, and effectively prevent the risk of any fire hazards.

Choose YIHUA with Confidence – Enjoy our 12-month US- exclusive manufacturer technical coverage and 24/7 professional assistance on Amazon. Note: This model is designed to operate on 110-127V with a US-standard power plug.

name: Astro Pneumatic 9426 Industrial Heavy Duty Heat Gun
short_description: Variable temperature adjustment provides a maximum temperature of 1000-1100DegreeF
Powerful blower provides a high volume of air needed for industrial applications; Moves 23 CFM
Cool air setting for cooling tool and for no-heat applications that adds versatility
Three setting power switch and Three position non-slip steel base
Air intake vent, Hands -Free versatile stand
product_description: The Astro Pneumatic 9426 Industrial Heavy Duty Heat Gun comes equipped with a powerful blower that provides a high volume of air needed for industrial applications, and can move 6 SCFM. The variable temperature adjustment provides a maximum temperature of 1000-1100DegreeF, and it also comes equipped with a cool air setting for cooling and no-heat applications, which adds versatility. This tool has a three setting power switch a long with a three position non-slip steel base. It is built with an air intake vent. Specifications: Voltage: 120V, 60Hz Amperage: 13A Weight: 4.68lbs Temperature: 1000-1100DegreeF Air Volume: 23 CFM Wattage: 1600W
